description: This file contains a test case for the React application 'Bike Connect', using testing-library/react and react-router-dom to render the App component within routing and authentication context providers, and verifying that the main title text is present.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case named 'renders Bike Connect home' that renders the App component within routing and authentication context providers and verifies the presence of the main title text.
